name: Work in Progress (Spectr Studios)
description:
Work In Progress

Work in Progress is a story driven platformer ,where you the player play as Pyxel (a cute robot :D ) and you must help the developer of the game to playtest, complete the levels and squash the bugs. Will you be able to do it?

Wait who's the dev?

Some things should better remain a secret....

This Project was made for the 6th Kindred Community game jam with the theme:

"At the beginning there was nothing"      Controls:

A and D or Right and Left Arrow keys to move.

W or Up arrow keys to Jump

Click left mouse button to shoot the enemies(bugs)

   Meet the Devs (The real ones): Programming :

Xtreamous- Check him out on Youtube
